title: Strengthening AI Practical Competencies: Interactive Language Education Utilizing Mobile Microlearning

context.prior_knowledge: Proficiency in basic digital device usage and intermediate or higher language proficiency
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can design language-learning activities utilizing four interaction types (interface, peer, content, instructor) in mobile environments
According to distributed learning principles, learners can divide weekly learning content into three or more segments and establish action plans
Applying generative instructional strategies (concept/procedure/principle levels), learners can generate five or more language-use examples tailored to workplace scenarios
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
